column4: has anyone else noticed the compiz shift switcher behaves differently in 12.04?
then when you released ALT, it would shift focus to that window
now, I have to press ENTER to shift the focus to that window
yeah, just kind of annoying.  i don't understand why the change from 11.10 to 12.04
still works that way for me
good to know, guess i should reinstall compiz ccsm and/or unity?
